title: Saikyou no Shokugyou wa Yuusha demo Kenja demo Naku Kanteishi (Kari) Rashii desu yo?

synonyms: The Strongest Job is Apparently Not a Hero or a Sage, but an Appraiser (Provisional)!
alternative_titles.ja: 最強の職業は勇者でも賢者でもなく鑑定士（仮）らしいですよ？

synopsis:
Hibiki, a high school student who was suddenly transferred to another world, wanders alone in a vast grassland of a fantasy world where monsters inhabit. All he has are non-combat skills such as "Appraisal"! From a hopeless situation, he is saved by encounters, and his all-powerful abilities blossom! An another world adventure tale of miraculous reversal cheats burst forth!

(Source: AlphaPolis)
